title: A thawhpui te - Orbital Temple
heading: Partner te an ni
intro: Orbital Temple hi thawhpui mak tak takte thilphalna, thiamna leh vision hmanga awm a ni. Engineering satellite atanga crafting narratives thlengin, ram hla tak takah kawngkhar hawn atanga rangkachak hmanga mumang paih thlengin, thawhhona tin hian he biak in hi arsi hnaih zawkah a hruai lut a ni.

riseNy.name: RiseNY&Partners te chuan an rawn ti a
riseNy.description: Communication, integrated experiences leh 3D render imagery mak tak tak te chuan satellite hian space a khawih hmain a vision chu a ti nung a ni.

highestMantra.name: Kan Mantra sang ber
highestMantra.description: Sathi Roy kaihhruaina hnuaiah Orbital Temple chu India rama thlarau lam leh artistic community te nen a thlunzawm a ni. November 2025-a tlangzarh a nih hnua sum thawhkhawmna, culture exchange, leh Art Basel exhibition neihna tur kawng hawn.

allToSpace.name: A zawng zawng chu Space-ah a awm
allToSpace.description: Brazil rama satellite tenau lama specialist te an ni. Kum li chhung zet thawhhona tha tak neiin open source hardware platform siam a, Global South atanga art orbit-a thawn chhuahna kawngah hmahruaitu a ni.

isro.name: ISRO a ni
isro.description: Indian Space Research Organisation chuan a rawn ti a. November 2025 khan Orbital Temple chu ni-synchronous orbit-a phurtu PSLV mission atana launch provider a ni.

mercosul.name: Mercosur Biennial vawi 13-na neih a ni
mercosul.description: Brazil khawpui Porto Alegre-ah a awm. Marcello Dantas-a curate niin, assistant curator Laura Cattani, Munir Klamt, Tarsila Riso, leh Carollina Lauriano te nen an thawk dun a ni.

inpe.name: INPE / ArtSat hnathawhna hmunpui a ni
inpe.description: Satellite siamtu team hi II ArtSat Workshop neih chhung khan din a ni. Fabiane M. Borges-a kaihhruai, Lázaro Camargo-a kaihhruai, Ítalo Pinto Rodrigues-a thawhpui, Walter Abrahão dos Santos-a enkawl.

solidConcepts.name: Thurin nghet tak tak (Solid Concepts) te
solidConcepts.description: Eduardo Dias-a kaihhruaina hnuaiah a awm. 3D printing leh gold micro casting zawng zawng hian sculptural dome atan hna a thawk vek a, digital mumang chu precious metal reality-ah a chantir vek a ni.

ideaSpace.name: Ngaihtuahna hmun (Idea Space) a ni
ideaSpace.description: Brazilian education startup chuan Quebrada Space Program curriculum siamin, Brazil ram puma high school zirlai te tana hman theih tura inpeih a ni.

closing: Orbital Temple nen thawhhona tha tak neih i duh em? Hmangaihna hi han phar rawh .

imageAlts.riseNy: RiseNY&Partners te Logo a awm bawk
imageAlts.allToSpace: All to Space Logo a awm vek
